It keeps track of all created vesting schedules, indexed by beneficiary and owner. Can only be called once.","params":{"adminForProxies_":"The admin address for the created proxies.","initialOwner_":"The initial owner of the factory.","initialVestingImplementation_":"The initial implementation address for vesting contracts.","pREWATokenAddress_":"The address of the pREWA token to be vested."}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setImplementation(address)":{"params":{"newImplementation":"The address of the new implementation contract."},"returns":{"success":"A boolean indicating if the operation was successful."}},"setProxyAdmin(address)":{"params":{"newProxyAdminAddress":"The address of the new proxy admin contract."},"returns":{"success":"A boolean indicating if the operation was successful."}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."}},"stateVariables":{"_allVestingContracts":{"details":"An array of all vesting contract addresses created by this factory."},"_vestingCreationInProgress":{"details":"A reentrancy lock specific to a `(creator, beneficiary)` pair. constructor.details: Disables the regular constructor to make the contract upgradeable.

createVesting(address,uint256,uint256,ui.details: This function is reentrancy-proof by implementing a specific lock (`_vestingCreationInProgress`). It strictly follows the Checks-Effects-Interactions (CEI) principle to prevent state inconsistencies during external calls.

params.amount: The total amount of tokens to be vested.
params.beneficiary: The address that will receive the vested tokens.
params.cliffDuration: The duration in seconds during which no tokens are vested.
params.duration: The total duration of the vesting period in seconds.
params.revocable: A flag indicating whether the vesting can be revoked by the owner.
params.startTime: The timestamp when the vesting period begins. Use 0 for current block timestamp.

returns.vestingAddress: The address of the newly created vesting contract.

params.limit: The maximum number of addresses to return.

returns.page: A memory array of all vesting contract addresses.
returns.total: The total number of vesting contracts created.

returns._0: An array of vesting contract addresses.

params.limit: The maximum number of addresses to return.

returns.page: A memory array of vesting contract addresses.
returns.total: The total number of vesting contracts for the beneficiary.

returns._0: An array of vesting contract addresses.

params.limit: The maximum number of addresses to return.

returns.page: A memory array of vesting contract addresses.
returns.total: The total number of vesting contracts for the owner.

initialize(address,address,address,addre.details: Sets the owner, token address, initial implementation, and proxy admin. Can only be called once.

params.adminForProxies_: The admin address for the created proxies.
params.initialOwner_: The initial owner of the factory.
params.initialVestingImplementation_: The initial implementation address for vesting contracts.
params.pREWATokenAddress_: The address of the pREWA token to be vested.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newImplementation: The address of the new implementation contract.

returns.success: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

params.newProxyAdminAddress: The address of the new proxy admin contract.

returns.success: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

createVesting(address,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Creates and initializes a new vesting contract (proxy) for a beneficiary.

getAllVestingContractsPaginated(uint256,.notice: Retrieves a paginated list of all vesting contracts created by this factory.

getImplementation().notice: Gets the address of the current vesting implementation contract.

getTokenAddress().notice: Gets the address of the token used for vesting.

getVestingsByBeneficiary(address).notice: Retrieves all vesting contracts created for a specific beneficiary.

getVestingsByBeneficiaryPaginated(addres.notice: Retrieves a paginated list of vesting contracts for a specific beneficiary.

getVestingsByOwner(address).notice: Retrieves all vesting contracts created by a specific owner.

getVestingsByOwnerPaginated(address,uint.notice: Retrieves a paginated list of vesting contracts created by a specific owner.

pREWAToken().notice: The pREWA token contract used for all vesting schedules.

proxyAdminAddress().notice: The address of the admin for all created proxies (typically a `ProxyAdmin` contract).

setImplementation(address).notice: Sets a new implementation address for future vesting contract creations.

setProxyAdmin(address).notice: Sets a new admin address for all future proxy deployments.

vestingImplementation().notice: The address of the logic contract (`VestingImplementation`) for new proxies.
